tag_list: copywriting, writing, freelance-writing, media-companies, seo-companies, online-media
overview:
Edina Jackson is a freelance writer/author and business woman. She currently owns Intrigue Media which is a copywriting company and online media company. Intrigue media owns various online publications such as an online music magazine; and a self help website/blog. Intrigue Media is currently adding to their list of online publications with more to come in the future.

Intrigue Media has clients the world over. They have worked with some of the most well know corporations and they continue to go from strength to strength.

Intrigue Media is always looking for talented writers to join their team. They are also always looking for artists, successful business people and creative types to feature on their websites. Please contact enquiries@intriguemedia.co.uk to find out about writing for us or featuring on one of our online publications.

Edina Jackson is also a children’s author. Her book Dusty the Ditsy Dog Paints the Town Blue is currently on the shelves.

http://www.edinajackson.co.uk
